DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis iodine supplementation lower serum TSH leptin concentration thereby improve lipid glucose profile .
DOC.detailed_description: The study double blind , placebo control intervention study obese woman live Atlas foot mountain Morocco , iodine deficient area . Eligible subject randomize intervention control group receive respective supplement 6 month . At baseline , midpoint endpoint anthropometric well metabolic profile assess . A health questionnaire administer monthly tablet follow month distribute . Urine sample determine iodine status also collect monthly .
DOC.criteria: Women reproductive age ( 20 50 year ) Body mass index 27 40 kg/m2 Having receive oral write information aim procedure study Willing comply study procedure Having provide oral write informed consent Chronic disease gastrointestinal disorder Nodular goiter Regular use medication ( except oral contraceptive ) Pregnancy lactation Subject expect comply study protocol
